attributes.additional_details: Four flyers from the government about expansion plans have been posted through my letterbox. This project has to be stopped. The government have continued with plans to extend Heathrow despite massive opposition from thousands and thousands of citizens. Please stop this and find other greener solutions to global transport and international trade.
attributes.background: Say no to more noise, more planes. more POLLUTION! Lets find solutions to climate change not create more damage.
